taskmaster-pro.title: TaskMaster Pro
taskmaster-pro.description: Fullstack task manager with professional architecture and a focus on real teams.

problem.description: Many product teams manage work with tools that don't fit their real flow, causing operational friction, lost visibility, and scalability issues as the team grows.
painPoints: Inflexible roles and permissions that don't reflect the real team structure.
Information overload that hinders adoption by non-technical profiles.
Lack of clear visibility into the real status of work and bottlenecks.
Difficulty scaling projects and teams without losing control or traceability.
Dependency on multiple tools to cover basic needs (tasks, communication, tracking).

solution.description: I designed and developed a SaaS fullstack platform that centralizes task, team, and project management, prioritizing clean architecture and a fluid user experience.

features.title: Kanban Board
features.description: Intuitive task visualization with drag-and-drop functionality.

features.title: Internationalization (i18n)
features.description: Full support for Spanish and English, with automatic language detection.

features.title: Project Management
features.description: Organize your tasks into different projects for better tracking.

features.title: Team Management
features.description: Collaborate with other users within specific projects.

features.title: Notification System
features.description: Stay up to date with updates on your tasks and mentions.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: JWT-based login and registration with route protection.

features.title: Search and Filtering
features.description: Quickly locate tasks by title, status, or priority.

features.title: Automatic Task Priority Classification
features.description: Auto-management of task priority (low, medium, high) can be enabled in settings based on the configured time margin.

features.title: Premium Design
features.description: Modern, responsive interface with fluid animations (Framer Motion).

challenges.title: Kanban State Management
challenges.description: Maintaining task order consistency after multiple drag-and-drop moves and syncing with the DB.

challenges.title: Board Performance
challenges.description: Efficient rendering of hundreds of tasks using virtualization and selective memoization.

reserva-saas.title: SaaS Booking Platform
reserva-saas.description: Online booking system with integrated payments for professionals and small service businesses.

problem.description: Many service professionals (classes, consultations, creative sessions) manage their bookings manually via WhatsApp, email, or unsynchronized calendars, creating errors, wasted time, and missed appointments.
painPoints: Lack of upfront payments or deposits.
Generic tools poorly adapted to their real workflow.

solution.description: I designed and developed a SaaS platform that centralizes the management of bookings, clients, and payments in a single system, allowing professionals to automate their schedule and reduce operational friction.

features.title: Authentication and Access Control
features.description: Flexible and secure authentication system supporting multiple access methods and clearly separating Admin, Provider, and Client roles.
details: Login with Google OAuth, Email/Password, and Magic Links.
OTP verification for email registrations.
RBAC with differentiated portals.
Active abuse protections: rate limiting, CAPTCHA, and honeypots.

features.title: Advanced Booking Engine
features.description: Configurable booking engine allowing professionals to define services, availability, and complex rules without friction for the end client.
details: Flexible services: duration, price, capacity (1-on-1 or groups).
Hybrid availability with weekly rules and date exceptions.
Automatic buffers between appointments to avoid overlaps.
Concurrency management per service and global limits.

features.title: Google Calendar Sync
features.description: Two-way synchronization with Google Calendar to avoid double bookings and keep the schedule always updated.
details: Automatic import of external events.
Real-time blocking of busy times.
Automatic update upon cancellations or rescheduling.

features.title: Integrated Payments and Monetization
features.description: Complete payment system with Stripe allowing upfront charges, automatic payouts, and a scalable SaaS model.
details: Upfront payments to confirm bookings.
Stripe Connect Express for direct provider payouts.
Support for platform fees per transaction.
Monthly or annual subscription plans for providers.

features.title: Recurring Bookings Management
features.description: Native support for periodic bookings, ideal for classes, therapies, and continuous services.
details: Weekly or monthly configuration.
Automatic generation of future sessions.
Centralized management of cancellations and changes.

features.title: Internationalization (i18n)
features.description: Platform ready for international audiences with full multi-language support.
details: Interface fully translated to English and Spanish.
Automatic language detection via middleware.
Localized emails and error messages.

features.title: Automation and Notifications
features.description: Automation system reducing manual tasks and keeping clients and providers informed.
details: Automatic reminders 24h and 1h before the appointment.
Transactional emails for confirmations and cancellations.
Serverless cron jobs.

features.title: Analytics and Dashboard
features.description: Interactive dashboard for providers to understand their business performance.
details: Revenue and booking volume metrics.
Most popular services.
Clear visualizations using interactive charts.

challenges.title: Handling Webhook Idempotency
challenges.description: Ensuring Stripe webhooks are processed exactly once. Network retries could cause duplicate records if not handled correctly.
